questions.skill: Calculate and interpret measures of center
questions.question: The ages of five employees are 24, 28, 31, 31, and 36. What is the mean age of these employees?
questions.explanation: Mean = sum of values / number of values = (24 + 28 + 31 + 31 + 36) / 5 = 150 / 5 = 30. Note that the median would be 31 (the middle value), which is a common distractor.
